entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
